author: jdcasey
msg: Adding unit test to ensure that system-scoped artifacts are always propagated at system scope, ignoring inheritedScope from the transitive parent.

author: geoff
msg: remove the mod_perl.pm entry from %INC after Apache::Test finishes
initializing itself.  because both mp1 and mp2 share the entry,
leaving it around means that Apache::Test might prevent later modules
from loading the real mod_perl module they're interested in, leading

author: ekoneil
msg: Fix the paths to the WSM samples -- these are currently disabled in the distribution build, so "clean.dist" and "build.dist" don't build them.
This also disables the wsm-addressbook-fromWSDL build since the Ant file has disappeared.  :)
Test: cd samples && ant clean build pass
